name: Nanalie
introduction: Lazy Princess, Attack and Defense Reduction
description: An airhead who has never had to worry about anything. Shy around strangers, but getting better and working toward becoming the woman she aspires to me.

passiveSkill.name: Schrodinger's Cat
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Nanalie appears, ATK of all enemies decreases by {placeholder} and DEF by {placeholder}, lasts 15 seconds."}

uniqueSkill.name: Sweet Dreams
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Ice crystals rain from above. Nanalie attacks an enemy row and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage."}

specialSkill.name: Manipulation
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Pierces the enemy with ice crystals. Nanalie attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing DEF Penetration by {placeholder} when attacking.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Telekinesis
normalSkill.description: Nanali summons a magical crystal. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Ice crystals rain from above. Nanalie attacks an enemy row and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Nanalie appears, ATK of all enemies decreases by {placeholder} and DEF by {placeholder}, lasts 15 seconds.
templateData.lens6.skill: Pierces the enemy with ice crystals. Nanalie attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing DEF Penetration by {placeholder} when attacking.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
